message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product for $110.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further. I'll sell the product to you for $105.
